name: Karma to Burn / / Sons of Alpha Centauri Tour Package
description:
Karma to Burn 7" vinyl release of their classic track 'Fourteen' or formerly known as 'Patty Hearst's Closet Mantra' from the debut Karma to Burn album. The second side is the track 'Conspiracy Theory' by Sons of Alpha Centauri. 

This vinyl is limited to 400 copies and was released by Kitchen Dweller Records (UK) and comes with a 'Korma to Burn' insert curry recipe and Kitchen Dweller vinyl promo card. 

The vinyl comes with a promotional poster for the release show on the 26.04.10 at the Highbury Garage in London. Artwork for the poster and the vinyl was undertaken by Alex Von Wieding and both products are on high gloss art paper.

name: Sons of Alpha Centauri / / Debut Album Release Package
description:
The debut 'Sons of Alpha Centauri' release package reissued. 

Contains the deluxe six panel digipack with silver embossed liqueur writing on UV gloss print. 12 page booklet with explanatory sticker with Braille hand stamp and rubber stamp.

Seldon Hunt signed UV gloss A3 artprint.

Two original SOAC badges from the 'Sound Devastation Records' promotional package.

name: Sons of Alpha Centauri / Treasure Cat / / Last Day of Summer Album Package
